common.disclaimer: My Car Concierge is a marketplace connecting vehicle owners with independent service providers. We do not perform any automotive services and do not guarantee workmanship, quality, or outcomes. All services are provided directly by independent providers who are solely responsible for their work.
common.disclaimerShort: Marketplace only. We connect you with providers but do not guarantee workmanship.
common.copyright: ¬© {{year}} My Car Concierge. All rights reserved.

landing.heroSubtitle: Post your service requests and let qualified providers compete for your business. Compare bids, choose the best value, and pay securely through escrow.
landing.featuresTitle: Everything you need, nothing you don't
landing.forMembersDesc: Manage all your vehicles in one place. Create service requests with clear expectations and let providers compete for your business.
landing.forMembersList1: Central hub for all your vehicles
landing.forProvidersDesc: Join a vetted network of automotive professionals. Receive well-documented requests and build lasting relationships with quality clients.
landing.step1Desc: Enter details, upload photos, and keep everything organized in your garage.
landing.step2Desc: Describe what you need‚Äîmaintenance, repairs, detailing, or body work.
landing.step3Desc: Review bids from vetted providers and pick the best fit for your needs.
landing.ctaTitle: Ready to simplify your car care?
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of drivers who've discovered a better way to maintain their vehicles.

scheduling.memberDropOff: I'll bring my vehicle to the shop
scheduling.mobileServiceDesc: Provider comes to your location (home, office, etc.)
scheduling.mobileServiceProviderDesc: I travel to the customer's location to perform services
scheduling.serviceLocationQuestion: Where should the service be performed?
scheduling.mobileServiceNote: Some providers offer mobile services and will come to you. This is common for detailing, minor repairs, and maintenance.

bidPacks.title: Bid Credit Packs
bidPacks.subtitle: Purchase bid credits to submit proposals
bidPacks.competitiveNoticeDesc: Each bid you place competes with other qualified providers. Members choose based on your price, ratings, and reviews‚Äîso competitive pricing and great service help you win more jobs.
bidPacks.nonRefundableNoticeDesc: All bid credits are non-refundable. Whether you win or lose a job, bid credits used are not returned. Bid wisely on jobs you're confident you can win.
bidPacks.bidTerms: By purchasing bid credits, you acknowledge that bids are non-refundable and that winning jobs is not guaranteed. Your success depends on competitive pricing, quality ratings, and customer reviews.

founder.heroSubtitle: Help grow My Car Concierge in your area and earn commissions on every service and bid pack purchase. Be our local voice and build income that grows with the platform.
founder.heroUrgency: We're onboarding founding ambassadors now. The earlier you start, the more you earn as the platform grows in your area.

howItWorks.label: How It Works
howItWorks.title: Promote. Connect. Earn.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Share My Car Concierge with friends, family, local businesses, and your community. Use your unique referral link to track signups.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Help onboard new members who need car services and recruit quality providers to join the platform in your area.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Receive a percentage of bid pack purchases and service fees from members and providers you refer. Passive income that grows.

commission.label: Earning Potential
commission.title: Your Commission Structure
commission.providerDesc: Earn 50% of every bid credit pack purchased by providers you refer. The more they buy, the more you earn.
commission.lifetimeDesc: Your referral link is permanent. Earn commissions on every bid pack purchase your providers make, forever.

earnings.label: Real Earning Potential
earnings.title: What Could You Earn?
earnings.partTimeItem1: Refer 5 providers who each buy $150/month in bid credits
earnings.partTimeItem3: Passive income that grows with your network
earnings.activeItem1: Refer 15 providers who each buy $200/month in bid credits
earnings.activeItem3: Build a network that pays you for years
earnings.note: *Earnings vary based on your effort and local market activity.

benefits.label: Founder Benefits
benefits.title: Everything you need to succeed as our local ambassador.
benefits.badgeDesc: A permanent badge on your profile marking you as an original founder. Exclusive status that can never be earned again.
benefits.dashboardDesc: Track your referrals, commissions, and performance in real-time with your dedicated founder dashboard.
benefits.marketingDesc: Receive branded business cards, flyers, and digital assets to help you promote My Car Concierge professionally.
benefits.earlyMoverDesc: Be the first to establish My Car Concierge in your community. Build your referral network before others arrive.
benefits.accessDesc: Direct line to the founding team. Shape the platform, suggest features, and get your questions answered fast.
benefits.growthDesc: Hit milestones and unlock bonus payouts. The more you grow the platform, the more you earn.

rightForYou.label: Perfect Fit
rightForYou.title: Is This Right For You?
rightForYou.autoDesc: Already connected to mechanics, detailers, or body shops? You're our ideal founder.
rightForYou.socialDesc: Car content creators, auto reviewers, or local influencers with engaged audiences.
rightForYou.enthusiastDesc: Active in car clubs, attend meets and shows, or just love talking cars.
rightForYou.networkerDesc: People who enjoy connecting others and building community relationships.
rightForYou.sideHustleDesc: Looking for flexible income that grows over time without a fixed schedule.

faq.label: Common Questions
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Commissions are paid monthly, by the 15th of each month for the previous month's qualified referrals.
faq.q2: Is there a minimum payout threshold?
faq.a2: Yes, minimum payout is $25. Balances below this roll over to the next month.
faq.q3: Can I refer people outside my local area?
faq.a3: Yes. While we encourage local focus, you earn commissions on any qualified referral regardless of location.
faq.q4: How do I track my referrals?
faq.a4: You'll receive access to your personal Founder Dashboard where you can track referrals, signups, and commissions in real-time.
faq.a5: For providers: completing profile setup and their first job. For members: completing their first service booking through the platform.
faq.q6: Is there a cost to join?
faq.a6: No. The Member Founder program is completely free to join. You receive marketing materials at no cost.
faq.q7: Can I lose my Founding Member status?
faq.a7: Your badge is permanent. However, commission eligibility requires compliance with our terms and no misrepresentation of the platform.

cta.title: Ready to earn?
cta.subtitle: Join our founding ambassadors and help build the future of automotive service while earning passive income.

form.promotionMethod: How will you promote My Car Concierge?
form.autoConnections: Do you have existing connections in the auto industry?
form.knowDetailers: Yes - I know detailers/auto spa owners
form.knowBodyshops: Yes - I know body shop owners
form.knowMultiple: Yes - I know multiple types of providers
form.industryWorker: Yes - I work in the auto industry
form.motivation: Why do you want to become a Member Founder?
form.motivationPlaceholder: Tell us about yourself, your network, and why you'd be a great ambassador for My Car Concierge...
form.disclaimer1: You are applying as an INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR, not an employee of My Car Concierge
form.disclaimer2: You are responsible for your own taxes, including self-employment tax
form.disclaimer3: Commissions are paid monthly for the previous month's qualified referrals
form.disclaimer4: You may not make false claims or misrepresent My Car Concierge services
form.disclaimer5: This agreement is non-exclusive; you may work with other companies
form.disclaimer6: Either party may terminate the agreement with 30 days written notice
form.disclaimer7: Confidential information must not be disclosed to third parties
form.disclaimer8: A formal Independent Contractor Agreement will be signed upon approval
form.agreeTerms: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
form.agreeContractor: I understand I am applying as an independent contractor and am responsible for my own taxes, insurance, and compliance with local laws
form.agreeCommission: I understand that commissions are earned only for qualified referrals as defined in the Member Founder Agreement, and I will sign the formal agreement upon approval
form.agreeAccurate: I certify that all information provided in this application is accurate and complete
form.formNote: We'll review your application and respond within 48-72 hours.
form.successMessage: Thank you for applying to become a Member Founder.
form.successFollowup: We'll review your application and send you the Independent Contractor Agreement to sign within 48-72 hours.
